tasks.title: [Smythson] Review Black Friday asset performance (1 week check)
tasks.notes: Follow-up from Black Friday assets going live Nov 17. Review ROAS vs 2024, conversion rates, and efficiency to confirm we avoided the learning reset that cost £24k last year. Check all 4 accounts (UK, USA, EUR, ROW). Success: ROAS maintains pre-BF levels, no 35% drop like 2024.

tasks.title: [Smythson] Revert Black Friday assets + create checklist for smooth execution
tasks.notes:
Revert all Black Friday assets to standard Christmas/product messaging. Create implementation checklist BEFORE Dec 2 to avoid Nov 18 execution issues (URLs, images, wrong asset groups). Coordinate with Lauryn: images, text, URLs go live simultaneously. Goal: smoother ride than Nov 18 launch.

**Progress Update (Nov 18 meeting):** Lauryn committed to creating checklist and sent through asset reversion spreadsheet: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1wwILYgddS946SAlvD5yjLjbLMRFQagsi0-5XFJmvC1g/edit?gid=0#gid=0

**Checklist includes:** PMax (images, text, videos, URLs, sentence case) + Search (RSAs, image assets, sitelinks) across UK/US/EUR/ROW accounts. Work split: Peter (UK, EUR) | Lauryn (US, ROW). All items currently pending execution before Dec 2 deadline.
